column1: WEATHER FORECAST FOR SEA AREAS AROUND THE ISLAND DURING NEXT 24 HOURS
Showers or thundershowers may occur at several places in the sea areas off the coast extending
from Puttalam to Hambantota via Colombo   and Galle during the afternoon or night.
Winds will be easterly or variable and wind speed will be (20-30) kmph.
Sea areas around the island will be slight to moderate.
